item.description:
Date: Sunday August 17, 2008
Time: 1:30 pm - 5:30 pm

Due to the potential of wind and current this event is recommended for kayakers with sea-kayaks only who also have experience in paddling in tidal areas as well as wet exit & capsize recoveries. Also you must have appropriate safety gear including PFD, Paddle Float & Pump.

Location: Dover, NH from Dover Hilton Park

From 95 North take Exit 4 onto Spaulding Turnpike/Route 16. After crossing the bridge, take 1st exit to the boat ramp.

Hilton Park/rest area is located at Dover Point on Great Bay and the Piscataqua River, adjacent to General Sullivan Bridge. Playground, picnic areas, boat launch. Dangerous currents, no swimming. Located just off Route 4/Spaulding Turnpike. Dover. Free Parking

This paddle is listed as 4 hours long, but may take longer.

Life vests must be worn when paddling with this group.

Google Directions/Map link below
Hilton Park Boat Launch
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at boat launch on at Hilton Park Dover, NH
item.name: NE Seacoast Paddlers - Cocheco River, Dover NH Paddle
